attributes.action: get bimingham city council to convert central fire station with it's original fittings into a free  science and industry museum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there is far too much of birminghams history hidden away in the dollman street stores.we need a permanent free science and industry museum to display these forgotten treasures.an ideal location would be cental fire station.lancaster circus.queensway.with it's original decor left intact.
think tank is neither cheap or appealing to the older generation.and as children we prefered the old museum in newhall street.with the good old exhibits.
